content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can't afford more than 1000 Euros per month, but I am willing to negotiate. What is your rental price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: My rental price for this apartment is 1200 Euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate with you. Is there a specific rental price that you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can't afford 1200 Euros, but I am willing to negotiate. What is your minimum rental price?

I also want to know if you are looking for a long-term or short-term lease.

And also I want to know if you are looking for a furnished or unfurnished apartment.

Lastly, I want to know if you have any move-in fees or any other additional costs.

Thanks for your time.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: My minimum rental price for this apartment is 1000 Euros per month. I am looking for a long-term lease of at least one year. The apartment is unfurnished, but I can provide some furniture at an additional cost. I do charge a move-in fee of 50 Euros and a security deposit of 250 Euros. Is there anything else you would like to know or discuss?
name: Heinrich Heine
